00021 class cConfiguration;

00031 class cConfigurationReader
00032 {
00033   public:
00037     class KeyValue {
00038       public:
00039         virtual ~KeyValue() {}
00040         virtual const char *getKey() const = 0;
00041         virtual const char *getValue() const = 0;
00042         virtual const char *getBaseDirectory() const = 0;
00043         virtual const char *getFileName() const = 0;
00044         virtual int getLineNumber() const = 0;
00045     };
00046 
00047   public:
00051     virtual ~cConfigurationReader() {}
00052 
00059     virtual void initializeFrom(cConfiguration *bootConfig) = 0;
00060 
00065     virtual const char *getFileName() const = 0;
00066 
00073     virtual const char *getDefaultBaseDirectory() const = 0;
00074 
00078     virtual int getNumSections() const = 0;
00079 
00084     virtual const char *getSectionName(int sectionId) const = 0;
00085 
00090     virtual int getNumEntries(int sectionId) const = 0;
00091 
00097     virtual const KeyValue& getEntry(int sectionId, int entryId) const = 0;
00098 
00103     virtual void dump() const = 0;
00104 };
